name: Around the Moon (Alekstudio_LTD)
description:
Beware! An army of enemy spaceships wants to destroy our moon! But ... you will save us and complete Operation "Around the Moon" perfectly!

I think you need to know what to do. Destroy kamikaze spaceships and don't let them touch our moon. Yes, you will have bonuses. Do it!

How to play

Already joined our space alliance and do not know how to fly the spaceship "Defender - 14"? I think I should give you a little briefing.

A-D - movement to the left and right.

Space - shoot.

Esc - pause.

Tip - don't forget to pick up bonuses. You just need to shoot them.

Don't forget to donate. I'll suports me and makes game better 💖
